channel.title: Have Lightning and Wolf runes, want drops
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Have Lightning and Wolf runes, want drops"

item.title: Re: Have Lightning and Wolf runes, want drops
item.content:encoded:
If you have another Low-End Kaiju Drop, I'd be willing to trade a Regalia against all 3.
Just post here if you're interested. ^_^

item.title: Re: Have Lightning and Wolf runes, want drops
Have Lightning and Wolf runes, want drops *done*
item.content:encoded:
I've got one extra Lightning rune and one Wolf rune that I'd like to trade for Kaiju drops. The ones I'm most interested in are in order of priority:

Any high end drop except Kaiju memento
Catgirl Entourage
Lab Coat
Shiny Belt
Late-Night Snack
Go Piece
Perfect Hair
Poisoned Daggers
Pokerballs
Persocom
Plug Suit
Claw Card

*Edit*
The runes have been traded
